story.storykicker: The Tripura Public Service Commission (TPSC) has released an employment notification, inviting interested, eligible candidates to apply for the positions of Principal and Lecturer. The last date for the submission of an application is June 30.
story.storybody:
The Tripura Public Service Commission (TPSC) has released an employment notification, inviting interested, eligible candidates to apply for the positions of Principal and Lecturer.

Vacancy details

Total posts: 69

Name of the posts:

Principal: 4

Lecturer: 65

Eligibility criteria

Educational qualification:

Principal: The candidates interested in applying for this post should be holding a degree in any branch of engineering preferably with one year's professional or teaching experience or diploma in any branch of engineering with at least five years of experience.

Lecturer: The candidates interested in applying for this post should be holding a Bachelor's degree or Master's degree in engineering technology in the relevant branch or first class Master's degree in appropriate subject with first class or equivalent at Bachelor's or Master's level from UGC.

Age limit:

Principal: The age of the candidates applying for this post must not exceed 45 years.

Lecturer: The age of the candidates applying for this post must not exceed 40 years.

Relaxation in age will be provided as per the government norms.

Selection procedure:

A preliminary examination/main examination/personality test will be conducted for shortlisting and the final selection of the candidates.

Pay scale:

The selected candidates will be getting a monthly salary of Rs 15,600 to Rs 39,100, along with a grade pay of Rs 5,400.

How to apply:

The candidates interested in these posts are required to send the applications along with necessary documents (regarding qualification/ experience/ permanent residence certificate/citizenship and age proof certificates) addressed to the 'Secretary, TPSC, Agartala, West Tripura' to Tripura Public Service Commission Secretariat during working hours.

The application form can also be downloaded from the official website, www.tpsc.gov.in.

Important dates

The last date for the submission of an application is June 30.

Read: Telangana State PSC is hiring: Apply for Geophysicist post and earn upto Rs 91,000 per month!

For information on more latest government jobs, click here.
